segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, her dress flowing softly around her knees.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely absorbed in drying that plate, as if the world around her has faded away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I notice the water spilling over the edge, forming a shiny puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the sound of water crashing against the cabinets?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a twinge of anxiety watching the boy on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined reaching for those cookies, stretching his little body almost too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him, waiting with her palm open, adds to the chaos of this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder if they realize the risks they’re taking in this pursuit of sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serenity of the garden outside feels like a stark contrast to this brewing disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how quickly things can go wrong when no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
